block_comment: The block sets conditions for a walking one data pattern setup for devices with 120 Data Query (DQ) pins. These conditions are predicated on the value of the `NUM_DQ_PINS` and `DATA_PATTERN`. The implementation achieves its functions mainly through a series of specific conditional checks: checking if the `NUM_DQ_PINS` equals to 120 and `DATA_PATTERN` equals to "DGEN_NEIGHBOR", "DGEN_WALKING1", "DGEN_WALKING0", or "DGEN_ALL". These conditions collectively form a more complex nested conditional setup to implement the walking one data pattern.
